movies.title: Hunger
movies.plot: The story of Bobby Sands, the IRA member who led the 1981 hunger strike in which Republican prisoners tried to win political status. It dramatises events in the Maze prison in the six weeks prior to Sandsâ€™ death.

events.title: Bobby Sands begins a hunger strike
Bobby Sands dies as a result of his refusal to eat
